metadata.name: glitchedbreakfast
metadata.description:
Hey there kids, are you tired of the game telling you to end your funny 1 fps run, by giving you a bajillion useless breakfasts? Are you irritated by the sheer concept of breakfasting in general? Introducing: Glitchfast! These delicious items are a great calorie free substitute to breakfasts. No more, will you have to drink anymore of that horrific, spoilt milk. You too, can now take the phrase "gamebreak" literally! Plus, it's also a slight reference to flash isaac, and who doesn't love that?
[h1] Credits [/h1] [list] [*]Idea - TheSilentGamer [*]Coding - Eucalyptus [/list]
